title: Queues over 1 hour in bronze the last three days... Time to leave OCE?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
This has been going on for three days now.  Doesn't matter what lanes I pick.  Surely there are at least 6 in bronze now?

Yesterday I went 70 minutes.  The day before 60 minutes then 60 again...

No response in the help forum from Riot.

replies.body: I would say its because mid and top are both popular picks.. But tonight i waited over 20 minutes for a game and i had locked in FILL as my choice.
Are you searching for a game at 2am or something? Usually people are in bet by then...
11:00 am in this case.  Today it's a bit better... I've been waiting for 2 hours but there were two lobbies formed (both ended in dodges.)

> [{quoted}](name=SailMad,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=09gBQe5I,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-01-31T21:07:36.306+0000)
>
> 11:00 am in this case.  Today it's a bit better... I've been waiting for 2 hours but there were two lobbies formed (both ended in dodges.)

Ahh so when the vast population is at school / work... I guess that would make perfect sense then.
pick fill cause those are the 2 most wanted roles in the game
Fill has no decrease in time.  I've tried that.
Its the new dynamic que system. It has destroyed offpeak que times, even que times in normal hours can sometimes be frustrating.
Man Im In Bronze Geting Out Very Fast Almost A Rank A Day But I Have No Problem I Was Placed In B5 For Some Reson But The Longist I Took Was 30 Mins
No offence, but LoL is struggling to find players at your... MMR. Perhaps queue with others?

> [{quoted}](name=SailMad,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=09gBQe5I,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-30T22:48:47.033+0000)

> No response in the help forum from Riot.

When theres a problem thats difficult for them to fix, the general reaction is to pretend it doesn't exist.
suspect a glitch. if it ever takes longer than 2 mins for me I jump out of the queue and jump back in again.
wow, im in in like minutes... that really sucks
Riot don't care about OCE Cause were trash to them
